entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Oxford House
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:31 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 35. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 37. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 19.

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
